import { useState } from 'react' import { FaTimes } from 'react-icons/fa' import { setGlobalState, useGlobalState } from '../store' // import { raiseProposal } from '../Blockchain.services' import { toast } from 'react-toastify' const CreateProposal = () => { const [createModal] = useGlobalState('createModal') const [title, setTitle] = useState('title') const [amount, setAmount] = useState(234.2) const [beneficiary, setBeneficiary] = useState('beneficiary 1') const [description, setDescription] = useState('afasd akdjhashf kdsfsfhbdsafh dkfhaskudfh ') const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() if (!title || !description || !beneficiary || !amount) return const proposal = { title, description, beneficiary, amount } // await raiseProposal(proposal) toast.success('Proposal created, reloading in progress...') closeModal() } const closeModal = () => { setGlobalState('createModal', 'scale-0') resetForm() } const resetForm = () => { setTitle('') setAmount('') setBeneficiary('') setDescription('') } return (

Raise Proposal

setTitle(e.target.value)} value={title} required />
setAmount(e.target.value)} value={amount} required />
setBeneficiary(e.target.value)} value={beneficiary} required />
) } export default CreateProposal
